page.title: 17THE ARTS IN SOUTH NORMANTON
page.content: The Art programmes in the area occur at the South Normanton Community Centre,Junction 28 Community Arts programme and Kirkstead Community Centre at Pinxton.S.N. Community Centre offers these activities:Mon: a ladies over 60's club,Country and Western dance,writers workshop and Camera club.Tues:Bridge/Whist Club and keep fit class.We:Mothers and Toddlers group,Modern Sequence dancing Youth Club and Chess Club.Thur:Garden club and Friendship Club for Disabled. Junction 28 has Akido classes, a Bingo club, Theatre club,Youth Theatre and 20 steps Drama Group.We surveyed the the Art interests of 483 junior children in the area.The results are Scouts 6, Cadets 5, Library 24, Cubs 27, Brownies 24,St Johns 2,Theatre gang 2,Dancing 12,Playscheme 3,Youth club 2,Guides 10 and Jazz Bands 11.
